author: aheritier
msg: Maven offline mode (-o or maven.mode.online=false) overrides maven.eclipse.src.download and maven.eclipse.javadoc.download

author: joes
msg: have fill_buffer() completely fill the multipart_buffer.  This
bug is tickled by the FireFox 2.0 when doing ssl uploads:

author: jaz
msg: refactored x509 implementations; now it will use the certificate to determine the userlogin; tomcat changed to ignore cert files (just pass through) so all checking can be handled by ofbiz; login worker updated to use new method of cert checking; added isser entity to configure what issuers are allowed to sign login certs (the certificate must also be included in a trust store) new component based trust/cert stores configured in ofbiz-component.xml
